comments.snippet:
I can follow the idea of hiding unnecessary switches, though if the connection is done using PuTTY this actually is an option I personally want to see. The reason is the following: 

The PuTTY Saved Connections not only allow you to quickly connect to an endpoint with all the settings as one likes, but also enables someone to save PuTTY presets which are used for multiple connections. 
For me these presets can be used for specifying different proxy servers, preselecting different baud rate/port ...
